alert.note: Alert for Forsyth; Gwinnett; Hall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 7:12PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Forsyth, northeastern Gwinnett and southwestern Hall Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 712 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lake Lanier Islands, or 7 miles southeast of Cumming, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Cumming, Sugar Hill, Buford, Braselton, Flowery Branch, Oakwood, Rest Haven, Buford Dam-Lake Lanier Parks, Aqualand Park, Chestnut Mountain, Oscarville, Lake Lanier Islands, and Hog Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
